author: veithen
msg: The fact that we use the Apache snapshot repository as plugin repository causes some instability in the build. To avoid this, a pluginManagement section has been added to the master POM.

author: amilas
msg: Let users to add AxisService to the AxisConfiguaration and call to the service client.
in this case axisservice is not removed from the configuration context when service client is garbadge

author: rjung
